-- auto-generated definition
create table gym_news
(
    id        bigint        not null,
    news_date date          null,
    writer    varchar(50)   null,
    image_url varchar(255)  null,
    title     varchar(255)  null,
    content   varchar(1000) null,
    constraint gym_news_id_uindex
        unique (id)
);

alter table gym_news
    add primary key (id);
